articles.description: Chipotle Digital Kitchen is adopting the “ghost kitchen” model — empty of diners and fast on orders — to boost online sales in “non-traditional locations.”
articles.content: As more people turn to takeout and delivery to avoid public places during the coronavirus outbreak, cash-strapped restaurateurs have been forced to chase down dollars in novel ways, including testing… [+3759 chars]
